input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Core Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Light Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Breakout Supergiara Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Italia CL Jersey'
  - Name='Cafe du Cycliste Men's Constance Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Sleeveless Quick-Dry Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Castelli Classifica Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Premio Evo Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Long-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Squadra Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Transfer Mesh Short Sleeve Baselayer'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Attack Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='SANTINI Men's Eroica Quiete Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='men Santini Tdf Arrivee Dash Jersey'
  - Name='Santini x UCI World Champion Japan Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini x UCI World Champion Spain Jersey Short Sleeve'
  - Name='Cafe du Cycliste Men's Olympe Jersey'
  - Name='Cafe du Cycliste SA Calobra Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Cafe du Cycliste Eze Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Cargo Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Espresso Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Entrata VI Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product shares the same core jersey name and likely similar function and construction tailored for cyclists, making it highly relevant.
Also a core jersey variant by Rapha with lightweight construction, similar cycling purpose but possibly lighter fabric which is closely relevant.
Also a core jersey variant by Rapha with lightweight construction, similar cycling purpose but possibly lighter fabric which is closely relevant.
Same as above - same product name and intended use with lightweight features relevant to the reference jersey.
Same as above - same product name and intended use with lightweight features relevant to the reference jersey.
A lightweight cycling jersey but part of a different line ('Brevet') by Rapha, likely similar function but some construction differences.
A lightweight professional cycling jersey from a known brand offering similar form-fitting, lightweight, breathable cycling apparel, reasonably relevant.
A cycling jersey but may target a different niche or style; name suggests specialized design, so moderately relevant to the core jersey.
A cycling jersey possibly with classical styling; relevant as a cycling jersey but details may differ from core jersey's tech and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Cafe du Cycliste Men's Constance Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey, which differs in sleeve length and potentially fabric weight from the reference short sleeve core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Sleeveless Quick-Dry Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sleeveless base layer rather than a standard cycling jersey; serves underlayer purpose, less aligned with the reference product's fully featured cycling jersey.
A cycling jersey from Castelli, likely high-quality, similar construction and performance features targeting cyclists similar to the reference.
Another advanced cycling jersey from Castelli with performance features, comparable to the reference product in function and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Long-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey from Pearl Izumi, relevant as cycling apparel but differentiated by sleeve length and possibly fabric tech.
A team-oriented cycling jersey likely similar in function and construction, suitable as a trained rider's performance apparel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Transfer Mesh Short Sleeve Baselayer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A baselayer rather than outer jersey; mesh fabric focuses on moisture transfer under jersey, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Attack Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey designed for women but likely similar purpose, fabric, and silhouette as the reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SANTINI Men's Eroica Quiete Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey from a notable brand targeting enthusiasts, with similar function though possibly different styling or tech details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Santini Tdf Arrivee Dash Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another Santini cycling jersey with race or event branding, relevant as technical cycling apparel but slightly specialized.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini x UCI World Champion Japan Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey branded for the World Champion, similar technical use though specialized in design and branding.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini x UCI World Champion Spain Jersey Short Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same rationale as above, specialized World Champion jersey but maintains cycling jersey function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Cafe du Cycliste Men's Olympe Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey likely with similar technical features, relevant for riders seeking comparable performance gear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Cafe du Cycliste SA Calobra Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey from Cafe du Cycliste offering technical cycling apparel, reasonably relevant in functionality and form.
Another cycling jersey variant from Cafe du Cycliste, closely related in function and purpose to the reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Cargo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey with cargo pockets may differ in silhouette and intended use, lowering relevance to core short sleeve jersey.
Performance cycling jersey by Castelli, relevant due to similar construction and cycling-focused features.
Contemporary cycling jersey from Castelli, functional and technical geared for road cycling, quite relevant to the reference.
